message: I'm feeling generous, but I want the majority of the money.  Accept this offer and we're both rich.
Alice, let's be reasonable. This offer ensures we both benefit significantly. Don't be greedy!
Bob, you're being a little too aggressive. This is a fair compromise, and we can both walk away with a substantial sum. Let's end this before inflation eats away any more of our potential winnings.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical solution. Let's end this now before we both lose out even more.
